title: An Open, Dark Secret: Ireland Reacts To Mass Grave Of Children
teaser: The bodies of hundreds of children were recently discovered in the Irish town of Tuam, left behind a former home for unmarried mothers. Alison O'Reilly of The Irish Mail broke the story, and she speaks with Robert Siegel about the mass grave and reactions to the news.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
